Text:
asanti2012 ~ WHY WOULD YOU SPOIL THE SHOW FOR EVERYONE BY GIVING AWAY THE MAIN PLOT????????? 

Attention everyone, unless you want the show you've been eagerly awaiting to be spoiled for you by an inconsiderable idiot, don't read the comment below. What a fucking wanker.

Gah. *Comment above.* I registered just to leave the comment, so I hadn't realized mine would be above his. I can't believe asanti2012 was that foolish and rude. 

The quality of the torrent is fine. I'm just pissed off that someone decided to ruin it.
Agree with Peacock94 - you're a real motherf**ker asanti2012! A seriously d**k move.
you're a real motherf**ker asanti2012!
You're a real motherf**ker asanti2012!
You're a real motherf**ker asanti2012!
What season this episode is.I have season 3.So is this episode season 4 or something.???

What a moron...
Go discuss with your knitting group- not in the torrent section.
How is it that such idiots can actually figure out how to download- shows you how easy getting torrents is....

Thanks for the up, which we will enjoy this evening.

As for asanti2012, here's an idea for a New Year's resolution:

KEEP YOUR BIG MOUTH SHUT!
Really? Gee, I've only been waiting for this about three months now. Why didn't you tell us then? Geeze  : (
asanti2012! = 1000 x real motherf**kers
asanti2012! = 10^9 x real motherf**kers
Though in assanti2012's defense, a simple google search of DA gives it away, too. The British press jumped all over this. : (

asanti2012... ThePirateBay should thank you for having sudden registrations since your smart comment. Registered only to write a comment. I hope you are enjoying your seconds of fame... can only be from someone that needs attention... sad.
Really ASANTI2012 !!! Who would put a comment like that on here?  What a total ass...
Can anyone can tell me if this episode is part of the season 3 or is from season 4.??Thanks in advance guys.??
It sits at the end of season 3 I believe, like the Christmas episode last year sat at the end of season 2.  So it is essentially between season 3 and 4.
Thanks a lot mate for the response.;-)

Please rate the quality using the +/- rater on the upper right corner of this page.  

And please ignore irresponsible plot-related spoiler comments you'll see if you go back into the first page of these comments.
Thanks! Perfect!
